product_name: Bronze Plaque - Black - Screws (visible from front)
ml_tags: -J.P. Ghamandi "What is written for you shall happen." Jamna Persad Ghamandi a.k.a.Bayo 1947-2021 Jamna Persad Ghamandi dedicated his life to the prosperity of the people and social environment of this community and Guyana. Early in his life, he was a skilled rice farmer who developed a love for nature. This led him to beautify the Corriverton area by planting hundreds of trees. In 1987, he opened J.P. Ghamandi Hardware Centre located at #79 Corriverton. As a prominent businessman, he was elected as a member of the Corriverton Town Council, and later held the position of Deputy Mayor. J.P. Ghamandi was also a founding member of this #66 Village Crematorium. This plaque commemorates only a few of his impacts and contributions to society, and stands as a memorial to his dedication and passion for public service.
